title: Amazon Earnings: Return to Profitability But Slow Growth Signaled Ahead
description: The e-commerce giant, which also turned a profit in its latest quarter, indicated sales in the holiday period might rise at their lowest level since 2001.
dc:creator: Karen Weise
media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
media:description: Amazonâ€™s quarterly results set it apart from other tech giants like Microsoft and Meta, which sent worrying signs about the economy with their earnings reports.
